Description: Works of imagination or narrative that are not based on fact.
Plays, theatrical performances, or works with intense, conflict-driven plots.
Works that are considered timeless and of enduring relevance.
Works focused on solving a crime or uncovering secrets.
Speculative fiction based on scientific concepts and futuristic themes.
Works featuring magical elements and imaginary worlds.
Fiction set in a specific historical period with realistic details.
Works designed to keep the reader on the edge of their seat with suspense.
Works based on real events, people, and facts.
